initialize().Description: Marks this spy as initialized. Once initialized, ResettingStubber begins recording intents and provides intent stubbing.

reset().Description: Clears state (initialization, expected responses). Must be called on main thread.

Returns: true if this spy is initialized

ClassDesc: A sneaky singleton object used to respond to intents with fake responses. This interface is not meant for public consumption. Test authors should use @B_android#support#test#espresso#intent#Intents_E@ instead.
